data.text:
Non-Executive Director

Appointed to the Board: 2013

Skills and experience: Andrew Lane brings a range of experience of dealing in complex legal and regulatory matters. He is a partner at Forsters LLP and specialises in private client law.

Other appointments: Trustee of the Pension Fund of the Royal Agricultural Society of England; Mail Force Charity CIO (Chairman).

Committee membership: Investment & Finance Committee and Audit & Risk Committee.
